event.title: was attested in written sources in 1154

data.event: Sora was attested in written sources in 1154 as Zower (and as Ceur in 1161 and Zevra in 1252).
A regular school was established in Sora in 1874, and the school building was remodeled in 1907.
A regular school was established in Sora in 1874, and the school building was remodeled in 1907.

event.title: was built below the church in 1911

data.event: A catchment basin for water was built below the church in 1911 at the initiative of the writer Fran Saleški Finžgar.
This name was removed in 1992, when the school was renamed the Sora Branch School (Slovene: Podružnična šola Sora).
